title: Not Ready for Marriage: A Young Couple's Return to Chastity
description:
Chris & Linda Padgett - Not Ready for Marriage: A Young Couple's Return to Chastity [audio presentation]

Chris Padgett is a husband and the father of eight children and one of the most effective champions of family life in the Church today. Prior to his familyâ€™s conversion to Catholicism in 1999, he co-founded the popular band, Scarecrow and Tinmen. Four bonus songs from his recent solo albums, Impact and Wonder, are included at the end of this presentation for your enjoyment.
